description: Convert Proto schema to Avrotize schema

args.name: input
args.help: Path of the proto file (or read from stdin if omitted)

args.name: --out
args.help: Path to the Avrotize schema file

args.name: --proto
args.help: Deprecated: Path of the proto file (for backcompat)

args.name: --namespace
args.help: Namespace for the Avrotize schema

args.name: --message-type
args.help: Generate the schema for a specific Proto message type and inline all references

description: Convert Avrotize schema to Kusto table schemas

args.name: input
args.help: Path to the Avrotize schema file (or read from stdin if omitted)

args.name: --out
args.help: Path to the Kusto table

args.name: --avsc
args.help: Deprecated: Path to the Avrotize schema file (for backcompat)

args.name: --kusto-uri
args.help: Kusto Cluster URI to apply the generated schema to.

args.name: --kusto-database
args.help: Kusto database name to apply the generated schema to

args.name: --record-type
args.help: Record type in the Avrotize schema

args.name: --emit-cloudevents-columns
args.help: Add CloudEvents columns to the Kusto table

args.name: --emit-cloudevents-dispatch
args.help: Emit a _cloudevents_dispatch ingestion table and update policies for each generated table

prompts.name: --kusto-uri
prompts.message: Enter the Kusto Cluster URI (optional)

prompts.name: --kusto-database
prompts.message: Enter the Kusto database name (optional)

prompts.name: --emit-cloudevents-columns
prompts.message: Add CloudEvents columns to the Kusto table?

prompts.name: --emit-cloudevents-dispatch
prompts.message: Emit a _cloudevents_dispatch ingestion table and update policies?

description: Convert Kusto schema to Avrotize schema

args.name: input
args.help: Kusto file

args.name: --out
args.help: Path to the Avrotize schema file

args.name: --kusto-uri
args.help: Kusto Cluster URI

args.name: --kusto-database
args.help: Kusto database

args.name: --table-name
args.help: Kusto table name

args.name: --namespace
args.help: Namespace for the Avrotize schema

args.name: --emit-cloudevents
args.help: Emit CloudEvents declarations for each table

args.name: --emit-xregistry
args.help: Emit an xRegistry manifest with CloudEvents declarations for each table instead of a single Avrotize schema

prompts.name: --namespace
prompts.message: Enter the namespace for the Avro schema

prompts.name: --emit-cloudevents
prompts.message: Emit CloudEvents declarations for each table?

prompts.name: --emit-xregistry
prompts.message: Emit an xRegistry manifest with CloudEvents declarations?
